com.sun.grizzly.tcp.http11
Class ClientAbortException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.io.IOException
              com.sun.grizzly.tcp.http11.ClientAbortException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class ClientAbortException
extends IOException

Wrap an IOException identifying it as being caused by an abort of a request by a remote client.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2006/09/21 22:02:28 $
Author:
Glenn L. Nielsen
